name: Dragon's Teeth
description:
A game for Global Game Jam 2023!

After defeating your mighty dragon foe and taking his teeth, you're finally free to plant them on your island by shaking your bag! But be careful! The fierce Teeth Warriors will fight anything that moves, including each other! Send them out to the ocean to calm down and patrol for any hidden dangers. Who knows who might come seeking revenge...?

Mouse controls, left click to grab things!

A game made by:
Tyler Rhodes
Nicole Ham
Jane
